channel.title: Esp Coder's House
channel.description: Recent content on Esp Coder's House

item.description: EspCoder provides consulting and software developemnt services specializing in complex business processes. Developed diverse systems from desktop applications that interacted with complex robotic manufacturing systems to an android-powered scan gun interacting with enterprise scale warehousing operations. Member of team that transformed Idaho Bureau of Homeland Security into one of the top performing states as recognized by FEMA. Building enterprise-grade systems transcends mere code. Itâ€™s a blend of teamwork, architectural insight, and a commitment to addressing multifaceted requirements.
